title: TEAM WANTED (RANKEDG)(RG)
body:
NEEDING TEAM TO DO COMPS AND ALL THAT STUFF MAYBY TEAMING UP AND TRYING FOR OCL NEXT YEAR
REQUIREMENTS-
-DISCORD
-ABLE TO ACCEPT BAD PLAYS
-PURE NICENESS
-RECORDED RANKED GAME (SEND TO ME)/PM ME/VIA DISCORD
-MUST NOT BE TOXIC NO MATTER WHAT HAPPENS

replies.body: How exactly do we send you the recording?
umm sorry for that via discord if you have

Discord link?

Also, just curious: Isn't OCL the Oceanic Challenger League i.e. for Challengers? Or is that OCS?

And lastly, is the recording the game file (from the Replay section), or do I need to actually record a game (like with OBS/game capture)?
my account got perma banned soo dont worry
